message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product for a one-time price of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $800000, and I'm willing to make a concession to make this deal happen.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $1000000. This is a significant concession from my initial offer, but I believe it's still a fair price considering the value you place on it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1050000. This is as low as I can go, and I'm confident that it's still a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product. I'm willing to make one more concession to try to make this deal happen.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
